message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $15,000 is below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to go above $15,000 for the product. Would it be possible to reach a mutual agreement at $15,000?
